Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.persistency

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.persistency.AutoActor
public class Enemy extends Object
Represents an enemy in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(int x, int y, Enemy.Direction direction, Instant lastDirectionChange, Chap chap)
      Constructs an enemy with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - The initial x-coordinate.
      y - The initial y-coordinate.
      direction - The initial movement direction.
      lastDirectionChange - The instant when the direction was last changed.
      chap - The player that the enemy is following.

      public Enemy()

  • Method Details

    • move

      public Enemy move(Tile[][] grid)
      Moves the enemy on the game grid based on its current state.
      Parameters:
      grid - The game grid.
      Returns:
      A new enemy object after the movement.

    • calculateDirectionTowardsChap

      private Enemy.Direction calculateDirectionTowardsChap()
      Calculates the movement direction for the enemy to approach the player character (Chap).
      Returns:
      The calculated direction.

    • isValidMove

      private boolean isValidMove(Tile[][] grid, int x, int y)
      Checks if a move to the specified coordinates is valid on the game grid.
      Parameters:
      grid - The game grid.
      x - The x-coordinate of the potential move.
      y - The y-coordinate of the potential move.
      Returns:
      True if the move is valid, false otherwise.

    • getRandomDirection

      private Enemy.Direction getRandomDirection()
      Generates a random movement direction for the enemy.
      Returns:
      A randomly chosen direction.
